== Padinjare Vemballur (627871) ==

Padinjare Vemballur is a village in the [[Kodungallur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 631 hectares and harbouring 2905 households with total population of 11836 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kodungallur]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 5556 and female population is 6280. Scheduled Caste Population is 1030 and Scheduled Tribes population is 16. Census Location Code of the village is 627871<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
